DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , open-label , first-in-human Phase 1 study evaluate anti-TIM-3 ( T cell immunoglobulin mucin contain protein-3 ) antibody TSR-022 , monotherapy combination anti-PD-1 antibody , patient advance solid tumor limit available treatment option . The study conduct 2 part : dose escalation cohort expansion .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Study TSR-022 , Anti-TIM-3 Monoclonal Antibody , Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors
